<small>Hebrew form: [[H7639]]</small>
<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎<big>שׂ</big>‎</span> <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שַׂבְּכָא‎</span> ( &gt; [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ס‎</span>, see [[BDB#Baer|Baer]]) **noun [masculine]** ==trigon==, musical instrument (whence probably Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">σαμβύκη</span>, triangular instrument with (four strings, see [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Lewy|Lewy]]<sup>Fremdw. 161 f.</sup> Prince<sup>EB 3238</sup> [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>[[Dan.3.5|Dan 3:5]]</sup>; also Biblical Hebrew <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שׂבָכָה‎</span> ***lattice-work***, √ <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שׂבך‎</span>, compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — [[Dan.3.5|Dan 3:5]]; [[Dan.3.7|Dan 3:7]]; [[Dan.3.10|Dan 3:10]]; [[Dan.3.15|Dan 3:15]].
